item.title: Adjust HM Collector resource limits and requests
item.description: Adjust HM Collector resource limits and requests Inspect current resource usage Inspect pods for OOMKilled events How to adjust resource limits Inspect current resource usage View resource usage of the containers in the cray-hms-hmcollector-ingress pods: ncn-mw# kubectl -n services top pod -l app.kubernetes.io/name=cray-hms-hmcollector --containers Example output: POD NAME CPU(cores) MEMORY(bytes) cray-hms-hmcollector-7c5b797c5c-zxt67 istio-proxy 187m 275Mi cray-hms-hmcollector-7c5b797c5c-zxt67 cray-hms-hmcollector 4398m 296Mi The default resource limits for the cray-hms-hmcollector container are: CPU: 4 or 4000m Memory: 5Gi The default resource limits for the istio-proxy container are:
